mapper.insert: insert into classa (UUID, class_type, class_name, teacher_id, teacher_name, phone, start_class_time, end_class_time, expect_number_people, actual_number_people, plan_number, already_number, course_id, course_name, remarks ) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacherId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startClassTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endClassTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expectNumberPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actualNumberPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alreadyNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update classa set class_type = #{classType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_name = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher_id = #{teacherId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher_name = #{teacherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_class_time = #{startClassTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_class_time = #{endClassTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expect_number_people = #{expectNumberPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, actual_number_people = #{actualNumberPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_number = #{planNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, already_number = #{alreadyNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, course_name = #{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select UUID, class_type, class_name, teacher_id, teacher_name, phone, start_class_time, end_class_time, expect_number_people, actual_number_people, plan_number, already_number, course_id, course_name, remarks from classa where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
